import.importCanRead: Import can read CSV (bulk import) and JSON (full fidelity).
import.step2: Choose format: CSV (simple/bulk) or JSON (Legendary/full fidelity).
import.step3: Validate in Import dialog (dry-run) before import.
import.invalidPurpose: Invalid purpose-id: main_purpose_id/sub_purpose_ids must be valid UUIDs from the database.
import.jsonEscaping: JSON escaping in CSV: quotes in JSON must be written as {'""'} in CSV cell.
import.missingSteps: Missing steps: if step_N_title exists, step_N_body must also exist.
import.chooseEarly: Choose mode early ‚Äì QA, UI and runtime expect the correct structure.
import.basicMode: Simple play (basic): steps + materials. No digital interaction.
import.facilitatedMode: Facilitated activity (facilitated): steps + phases/timer, optional public board.
import.participantsMode: Participant play (participants): steps + phases + roles + optional public board. For Legendary (artifacts/triggers), use JSON import.
import.csvFormatList2: Cells with comma/newline/quote wrapped in "..."; quotes written as ""
import.useJsonForArtifacts: Want to use artifacts or triggers? CSV contract doesn't include that. Choose JSON import (Legendary).
import.invalidJsonInColumn: Invalid JSON in JSON column (usually wrong quotes/escaping).
import.jsonLegendaryDesc: JSON is the format for Legendary/escape-room: artifacts + triggers + advanced step fields.
import.orderResolutionDesc: Triggers can reference stepOrder/phaseOrder/artifactOrder in condition/actions. Import resolves these to actual IDs.

landing.title: Try Lekbanken ‚Äì without creating an account
landing.description: Explore the platform without creating an account. Your demo session lasts 2 hours and all data is automatically deleted.

features.title: Architecture at a glance
features.description: The UI worlds stay separate but share a component library. The app/ structure follows Next.js App Router with route groups for marketing, app, and admin.

points.theme: Theme, Supabase, and i18n are loaded in the root layout.
points.layouts: Layouts stay thin and focus on navigation and chrome.

points.marketing: Marketing uses header and footer without coupling to app flows.
points.app: App has bottom navigation and mobile-first components.
points.admin: Admin has a left sidebar and topbar with search/notifications.

points.app: App: mobile-first with airy desktop layout.
points.admin: Admin: desktop-first with fallback for smaller screens.

pricing.title: Three product experiences
pricing.description: The architecture separates public marketing, mobile App, and desktop Admin so each team can move at its own pace.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Landing pages and marketing without login.

app.name: App
app.description: Mobile-first flows with bottom navigation and shared components.

admin.name: Admin
admin.description: Admin portal with desktop priority, sidebar, and modular navigation.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - Lekbanken
metadata.description: How Lekbanken handles and protects your personal data

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Lekbanken, we care about your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data when you use our services.
introduction.gdpr: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Norwegian data protection legislation.

provided.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
provided.account: Account Information: Name, email address, password (encrypted)
provided.profile: Profile Information: Profile picture, biography, preferences
provided.organization: Organization Information: Organization name, contact details
provided.payment: Payment Information: Billing address (payment details are handled by Stripe)

automatic.title: 2.2 Information We Collect Automatically
automatic.usage: Usage Data: Page views, feature usage, session duration
automatic.device: Device Information: Device type, browser, operating system
automatic.logs: Log Data: IP address, date and time of access, error logs
automatic.cookies: Cookies: See our cookie policy below

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use your personal data to:

purposes.analytics: Analyze usage and optimize user experience
purposes.security: Detect and prevent fraud or security incidents

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on:
legalBasis.contract: Contract: To fulfill our agreement with you (service delivery)
legalBasis.consent: Consent: When you have given explicit consent (e.g., marketing)
legalBasis.interest: Legitimate Interest: To improve the service and prevent abuse
legalBasis.obligation: Legal Obligation: To comply with laws and regulations

sharing.title: 5. Sharing of Personal Data
sharing.intro: We only share your data with:

legal.title: 5.2 Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may share data if required by law, court order or government request.

transfers.title: 5.3 Business Transfers
transfers.content: In case of merger, acquisition or sale, your data may be transferred to the new owner.

location.title: 6.1 Where is Data Stored?
location.content: Your personal data is stored in Europe (via Supabase EU region) to comply with GDPR requirements.

duration.title: 6.2 How Long is Data Stored?
duration.active: Active Accounts: As long as your account is active
duration.closed: Closed Accounts: 30 days after closure (for backup purposes)

security.title: 6.3 Security Measures
security.https: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.access: Access: Obtain a copy of your personal data
rights.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
rights.portability: Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
rights.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.manage: You can manage cookies in your browser settings. Note that some features may not work properly if you block cookies.

demoSessions.title: 9. Demo Sessions
demoSessions.intro: Lekbanken offers demo sessions that let you try the platform without creating an account.

dataCollected.title: 9.1 Data collected during demo
dataCollected.content: During a demo session, we collect:
dataCollected.sessionCookie: Session cookie: A temporary cookie that identifies your demo session (lasts 2 hours)
dataCollected.ipAddress: IP address: For rate limiting and fraud prevention (not stored permanently)
dataCollected.usageData: Usage data: Anonymized statistics about features you use

dataRetention.title: 9.2 Demo data retention
dataRetention.content: All data created during a demo session is automatically deleted:
dataRetention.userCreated: User-created data: Deleted during nightly cleanup
dataRetention.noPersonal: We do not collect personal data (name, email) during demo sessions unless you voluntarily provide them to request a premium demo.

legalBasis.title: 9.3 Legal basis
legalBasis.content: Demo sessions are based on legitimate interest to allow potential customers to evaluate our product before purchase.

conversionData.title: 9.4 Conversion data
conversionData.content: If you request a premium demo via the form, we collect the information you provide (name, email, organization) based on consent to contact you.

children.title: 9. Children
children.content: Lekbanken is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you are a guardian and discover that your child has provided personal data, contact us and we will delete the information.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice in the service.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal data:

complaints.title: 12. Complaints
complaints.intro: If you are dissatisfied with how we handle your personal data, you have the right to file a complaint with Datatilsynet (Norway's data protection authority):

privacy.footer: By using Lekbanken, you agree to this privacy policy and our

metadata.title: Terms of Service - Lekbanken
metadata.description: Terms of service and rules for using Lekbanken

terms.title: Terms of Service

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Lekbanken! These terms of service ("Terms") govern your use of the Lekbanken platform and our services. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

eligibility.title: 2.1 Eligibility
eligibility.content: To use Lekbanken, you must be at least 18 years old or have permission from a guardian. If you use the service on behalf of an organization, you warrant that you have authority to enter into this agreement on behalf of the organization.

security.title: 2.2 Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure and for all activity that occurs under your account. You must immediately notify us if you discover unauthorized use of your account.

acceptable.title: 2.3 Acceptable Use
acceptable.illegal: Use the service for illegal purposes
acceptable.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the system
acceptable.harassment: Harass, threaten or insult other users

yourContent.title: 3.1 Your Content
yourContent.content: You retain ownership of all content you upload to Lekbanken. By uploading content, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, display and distribute your content to provide the service.

ourContent.title: 3.2 Our Content
ourContent.content: All software, design, text, graphics and other material provided by Lekbanken is protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights. You may not copy, modify or distribute our content without written permission.

fees.title: 4.1 Fees
fees.content: Some features of Lekbanken require a paid subscription. All prices are listed on our pricing page and include applicable VAT.

billing.title: 4.2 Billing
billing.content: Subscription fees are charged automatically at the beginning of each billing period. You are responsible for providing valid payment information.

refunds.title: 4.3 Refunds
refunds.content: Refunds are handled in accordance with our refund policy. Contact our support to discuss refunds within 14 days of purchase.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content: You may cancel your account at any time by contacting our support. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Lekbanken is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for indirect damages, lost profits or data loss arising from use of our services.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice in the service. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: 8. Applicable Law
law.content: These terms are governed by Norwegian law. Any disputes shall be resolved in Norwegian courts.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about these terms of service, please contact us:

activateEmergencyStop.title: Activate emergency stop?
activateEmergencyStop.description: This will immediately disable all {count} active triggers. No automatic events will run until you reactivate them.
activateEmergencyStop.descriptionShort: This will immediately disable all {count} active triggers.

reactivateAll.title: Reactivate all triggers?
reactivateAll.descriptionFromEmergency: This will reactivate all {count} disabled triggers that were active before the emergency stop.
reactivateAll.description: This will reactivate all {count} disabled triggers. Automatic events will start running again.
reactivateAll.descriptionShort: This will reactivate all {count} disabled triggers.

killSwitch.warning: All automatic events are disabled. The game may require manual control until triggers are reactivated.

cookie_consent.title: We value your privacy
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can choose which categories to allow.
cookie_consent.privacy_signal_notice: We detected that you have Global Privacy Control or Do Not Track enabled. We respect your privacy preference and will only use essential cookies.
cookie_consent.learn_more: Learn more about how we use cookies in our
cookie_consent.settings_description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you, such as logging in or filling in forms.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences, language settings, and providing enhanced features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting anonymous information. This helps us improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements. They may be set by our advertising partners.

declaration.title: Cookie Declaration
declaration.description: Below is a list of all cookies used on this website, categorized by type.
